it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions

Class Event<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions.AReaction<T>
      • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions.Event<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReaction<T>, Serializable, Comparable<IReaction<T>>

    public class Event<T>
extends AReaction<T>
    This reaction completely ignores the propensity conditioning of the conditions, and tries to run every time the TimeDistribution wants to.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRate

        public double getRate()
        Description copied from interface: IReaction
        Returns the speed of this reaction. It is an average number, and can potentially change during the simulation, depending on the implementation.
        Returns:
        the number of times this reaction is triggered per time unit.

      • cloneOnNewNode

        public Event<T> cloneOnNewNode(INode<T> n)
        Description copied from interface: IReaction
        This method allows to clone this reaction on a new node. It may result useful to support runtime creation of nodes with the same reaction programming, e.g. for morphogenesis.
        Parameters:
        n - The node where to clone this IReaction
        Returns:
        the cloned action
